sentences.en: Filled the door with her frowzy bulk; frowzy white hair; slovenly appearance.
sentences.cn: 懒散的她堵在门口；凌乱的白发；不修边幅的外表。

sentences.en: The drowsy browser knits its brows to browbeat the frowzy crow.
sentences.cn: 昏昏欲睡的吃草动物皱眉头恐吓邋遢的乌鸦.
那条肮脏的街道令人作呕。

sentences.en: There were frowzy fields, and cow-houses, and dunghills, and dustheaps, and ditches, and gardens, and summer-houses, and carpet-beating grounds, at the very door of the Railway.
sentences.cn: 在铁路线开始的地方有霉臭难闻的田野、牛棚、粪堆、垃圾堆、水沟、菜园、凉亭和敲打地毯的场地。

words.tran_cn: 霉臭的；难闻的；不整洁的（等于frowzy）
不整洁的（等于frowsy）；有臭味的；霉臭的

trans.tran_cn: 霉臭的，闷热的，不整洁的，肮脏的
